title: N.B.A. Draft Preview: A Deep Field Could Yield Surprise Stars
description: Fans may have heard of Chet Holmgren and Shaedon Sharpe, but others are ready for their shot: “I knew if I got good enough, the N.B.A. would find me,” one said.
dc:creator: David Gardner
media:description: Chet Holmgren is the front-runner to be the No. 1 overall pick in Thursday’s N.B.A. draft. He averaged 14.1 points and 9.9 rebounds per game in one season at Gonzaga.
